channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT

item.title: Report X-2024051419
item.description:
Report X-2024051419

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-14
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WET BOX UPON OPENING RESPONDER DISCOVERED A SINGLE INNER BOX WITH A EXIDE SPRINTER S26R LEAD ACID BATTERY THAT LEAKED OVER 2 INCHES OF CRAFT PAPER INSIDE SOILED WITH LIQUID FROM BATTERY NO OUTER PACKAGE MARKINGS INDICATING CONTENTS MAY BE HAZARDOUS. SUSPECTED UNDECLARED HAZMAT

item.title: Report X-2024051401
item.description:
Report X-2024051401

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-13
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING SMOOTHIES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM UTAH USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 4405Y3, DAILY-HARVEST (UT), 1812 S EMPIRE RD, SALT LAKE CITY UT 84104-3824.
